thread.title: Chiba Launches Third Marathon on Tokyo Bay Aqualine Expressway: Run Like Wind on Aqualine
thread.title_full: Chiba Launches Third Marathon on Tokyo Bay Aqualine Expressway: Run Like Wind on Aqualine - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Chiba Launches Third Marathon on Tokyo Bay Aqualine Expressway: Run Like Wind on Aqualine
text:
Chiba Aqualine Marathon Planning Committee
CHIBA, Japan , Oct. 26, The Chiba Prefectural Government announced the outline of the third Chiba Aqualine Marathon to be held in 2016 on Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 .
(Photo: http://prw.kyodonews.jp/opn/release/201510264922 )
(Document-English: http://prw.kyodonews.jp/prwfile/release/M102229/201510264922/_prw_OA1fl_wN0YNN91.pdf )
(Document-Traditional Chinese: http://prw.kyodonews.jp/prwfile/release/M102229/201510264922/_prw_OA2fl_tDzX41uo.pdf )
(Course Map: http://prw.kyodonews.jp/prwfile/release/M102229/201510264922/_prw_OA3fl_fCZ5z513.pdf )
The Chiba Aqualine Marathon 2016 is the third marathon and half-marathon runs on the Tokyo Bay Aqualine Expressway above the sea. It offers a unique opportunity to run surrounded by the sea and sky as well as the warm hospitality of locals.
The upcoming Chiba Aqualine Marathon is scheduled to be held on Sunday, Oct. 23, 2016 . A wheelchair half-marathon has been newly established in addition to the full marathon and half-marathon. The international division, in which non-Japanese nationals can participate on a priority basis, will also be set up. Applications will be accepted online from April 5 to 26, 2016 .
Application guidelines and other details of the event will be released around the end of February 2016 . For more information on the marathon run, access the official website of the Chiba Aqualine Marathon 2016 (English and Chinese pages are available).
Official website: http://chiba-aqualine-marathon.com/
